review: We use these to store our homeschool materials.  They are binders, but I do like that I haven't had any issues with pockets ripping, or metal clasps not lining up like I have with other brands.  Of course, they aren't under much stress, but I'm happy with them.
productTitle: Cardinal Round Ring View Binder, 3-Inch, White, Pack of 4 Binders (00430)
